name: X.Org Preferred License
notes: The main difference between this license and the standard MIT License is the text " (including the next paragraph)" in this license, which is not in the MIT license. This is not considered as a material differences by the SPDX legal team.
text:

DEALINGS IN THE SOFTWARE.
